thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com | 4 of 221
thread.title: Janet Marquardt
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Janet Marquardt

author: Janet Marquardt
title: Janet Marquardt
text: I've been choosing Auto Europe for at least 20 years--I can't remember when I did not! Always easy to book, change, and check reservation. Any company they use abroad is fully informed and if I have trouble I can just call them and they sort it out. Once we lost our wallets and they helped us deal with the need for the car to get replacement drivers licenses and credit cards. Once the company accused me of damage I had not made and they fought for me. I never look elsewhere and often book with them 2-3 times in the same year!
